resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157728</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1996</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Types of Texts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Strategies:Types der Texte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Strategies:Types d'écoute des textes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Strategies:Types escutando dos textos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategies:Types ascoltante dei testi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουσμα Strategies:Types των κειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Strategies:Types que escucha de textos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students are exposed and learn to recognize different types of text which they may encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes also some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer herausgestellt werden und erlernen, unterschiedliche 
Typen des Textes zu erkennen, die sie in hörenden Erfassenübungen 
antreffen können. Schließt auch irgendeine Übersetzung zum 
Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où des étudiants anglais sont 
exposés et apprennent à identifier les différents types de texte 
qu'ils peuvent rencontrer dans des exercices d'écoute de 
compréhension. Inclut également une certaine traduction à 
l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
sejam expostos e aprendam reconhecer os tipos diferentes de texto que 
podem encontrar em exercícios escutando da compreensão. Inclui
também alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi sono esposti ed imparano riconoscere i tipi differenti di 
testi che possono incontrare nelle esercitazioni ascoltanti di 
comprensione. Include egualmente una certa traduzione ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές εκτίθενται και μαθαίνουν να αναγνωρίζουν τους 
διαφορετικούς τύπους κειμένων που μπορούν να αντιμετωπίσουν στις 
ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. Περιλαμβάνει επίσης κάποια
μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde exponen y 
aprenden a los estudiantes ingleses reconocer diversos tipos de texto 
que puedan encontrar en ejercicios de la comprensión que escuchan. 
Incluye también una cierta traducción al hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Texte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">textos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κείμενα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">textos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
